title: Himi 65
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oiauē ‘e fēfē’i
Ko e hā ‘e hoko?
Teu lava’i ki he lelei
Pe tō ki he kovi?
2.
’E toho au fakataha
Mo e kau lilika,
Ki he fakamāu’anga
‘O hoku ‘Otua.
3.
Pea u tu’u mo kinautolu
Ki he fu’u mama’o
‘I he nima to’ohema
‘I he manavahē?
4.
Pea u tali tetetete
Pea u fakaongo,
Ki he lea faka’ilo
‘Eku mala’ia.
5.
‘E ‘ikai, ka teu kumi ni,
Ki hoku ‘Otua,
Pea u tafoki ‘o kole
Ki he’ene ‘ofa. *
